stages.instructions: Phase: draft. Read SKILL.md and references (as needed). Extract requirements, constraints, roles, inputs/outputs, and evaluation criteria. Record concise summaries in /draft and evidence in /facts.

Phase: draft. Produce or update a detailed test plan with rationale in docs/ai-agent-reviews/ai-agent-collaboration-exec_test_plan_2026-01-05.md. Keep /draft updated with a short summary and file path only.

Phase: execute. Produce or update the contract output file (changed files list, commands, test results, failure causes/next actions) in docs/ai-agent-reviews/ai-agent-collaboration-exec_contract_output_2026-01-08.md. Keep /facts minimal with file pointers.

Phase: execute. Generate subagent prompt set (Executor/Reviewer/Verifier) and pipeline spec (if needed) into docs/ai-agent-reviews/ai-agent-collaboration-exec_subagent_prompts_2026-01-08.md and docs/ai-agent-reviews/ai-agent-collaboration-exec_pipeline_spec_2026-01-08.json. Summarize paths in /facts only.
Phase: review. Perform independent review. Write/Update docs/ai-agent-reviews/ai-agent-collaboration-exec_review_2026-01-05_round1.md with evidence. Record a brief summary in /critique only.
Phase: revise. Apply fixes to artifacts based on review findings. Update final evaluation summary and verdict in /revise (short).
Phase: verify. Verify all required artifacts exist and contract output items are covered. Update /facts with minimal verification entries.
